name: HomeAssistantPodcast
0:
”Alexa, ask Home Assistant Podcast to play.”
”Alexa, ask Home Assistant Podcast to begin playing the podcast.”
”Alexa, play Home Assistant Podcast.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home assistant podcast
des:
The Alexa skill for the Home Assistant Podcast will play the most recent episode for you to enjoy on your Alexa enabled device.

Visit the podcast here: https://hasspodcast.io
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
